protocol_name: Metabolite extraction (modified Bligh and Dyer extraction method) and Untargeted LC-MS
protocol_name_html: Metabolite extraction (modified Bligh and Dyer extraction method) and Untargeted LC-MS
description: {"blocks":[{"key":"8a8nc","text":"Extraction of tissue metaboilites for untargeted LC-MS on LC-QTOF.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
before_start: {"blocks":[{"key":"76qal","text":"The tissue, disposable pestle and 1.5 ml-centrifuge tube in liquid nitrogen were chilled in liquid nitrogen.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

materials.reagent_name: Zorbax Eclipse plus C-18 Rapid Resolution High Throughput (RRHT) 2.1x 100mm 1.8 mm column

status_info: We use this protocol in our group and it is working

steps.data: {"blocks":[{"key":"5pbr5","text":"The tissue was pulverized in the presence of liquid nitrogen to fine powder. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"3dasc","text":"100 ml of chloroform and 200 ml of methanol were added to the fine powder and resuspended by vigorous vortexing.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"5q00k","text":"The mixture was stored at room temperature for 30 min. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"197ln","text":"Subsequently, 100 ml of chloroform and 100 ml of water were added and mixed. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"de52o","text":"The tube was centrifuged at 12,000 xg for 10 min. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"37oll","text":"The biphasic solutions were separated into two separate tubes without disturbing the protein precipitate at the interface. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"evesu","text":"The samples were vacuum concentrated to dryness in a Refrigerated CentriVap concentrator (Labconco, USA) at 4oC.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"offset":109,"length":1,"style":"sup"}],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"5v1tq","text":"The samples were reconstituted with 20 ml of mobile phase (95% water:5% ACN), vortexed and centrifuged at 12,000 xg for 10 minutes at 4oC.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"offset":135,"length":1,"style":"sup"}],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[],"guid":"DA858220DB4111E88E65335C09F57B4A","id":677503,"previous_guid":null,"section":"Metabolite extraction"}

{"blocks":[{"key":"am71f","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"7n9vm","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"55fpb","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"5plvc","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"9fq72","text":"The samples were analyzed on an Agilent 1260 Infinity-6540 UHD Accurate-Mass Quadrupole-Time-of-Flight (Q-TOF) LC\/MS system coupled with Dual Agilent Jet Stream Electrospray Ionization source. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"63j2p","text":"The injection volume was 3 ml of sample and separation was using a Zorbax Eclipse plus C-18 Rapid Resolution High Throughput (RRHT) 2.1x 100mm 1.8 mm column. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"7c51m","text":"The separation was performed at a flow rate of 0.45 mL\/min with linear gradient program. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"32h68","text":"Mobile phase A composed of 0.1% formic acid in Milli-Q water and mobile phase B composed of 0.1% formic acid in acetonitrile. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"9b11t","text":"The gradient program was set as follows: t= 0 min, 5% B; t=2 min, 5% B; t=15 min, 98% B; t=18min, 98%; t=20 min, 5% B and the final stop time, t=25 min, 5% B. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"a7si","text":"For positive ionization mode, two reference masses of \u00a0(i) 121.0509 m\/z and (ii) 922.0098 m\/z were measured continuously while for negative ionization mode, the reference masses were (i) 112.9855 and (ii) 1033.9881. Reference mass correction was enabled. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"a82s1","text":"The gas temperature was maintained at 300oC, drying gas flow was set at the rate of 8 L\/min, sheath gas temperature and sheath gas flow at 350oC and 11 L\/min respectively. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"offset":41,"length":1,"style":"sup"},{"offset":142,"length":1,"style":"sup"}],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"cm5cq","text":"The capillary voltage was 3500 V. The nebulizer pressure was set at 35 psi. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"2r4v9","text":"The MassHunter Workstation software B.05.01 (Agilent Technologies, USA) was applied for instrument control and data acquisition.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"90u7p","text":"The data was analyzed using the Mass Profiler Professional software version 12.6.1.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[],"guid":"36F4AF90DB4211E88E65335C09F57B4A","id":677504,"previous_guid":"DA858220DB4111E88E65335C09F57B4A","section":"Untargeted metabolomics by LC\/MS"}
